com.apriori.reflect

Class ClassHierarchyCrawler<R,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apriori.reflect.ClassHierarchyCrawler<R,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - result type of invoking the crawler
    P - parameter type for invoking the crawler (or Void if there is no parameter)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassVisitor<R,P>

    public class ClassHierarchyCrawler<R,P>
extends Object
implements ClassVisitor<R,P>
    A ClassVisitor that crawls an entire type hierarchy. It delegates to another visitor for each type in the hierarchy.
    See Also:
    builder(), crawlWith(Class, Object, ClassVisitor)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ClassHierarchyCrawler.Builder<R,P>
      Builder pattern for constructing ClassHierarchyCrawler instances.

      Creates a new builder.
      static <R,P> R crawlWith(Class<?> clazz, P param, ClassVisitor<R,P> visitor)
      Crawls the hierarchy of the specified type using the specified visitor.

      Crawls the hierarchy of the specified type.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static <R,P> ClassHierarchyCrawler.Builder<R,P> builder()
        Creates a new builder. The default settings include pre-order traversal, stopping the crawl on the first non-null result, and including interfaces in the crawl.
        Returns:
        a new builder

      • crawlWith

        public static <R,P> R crawlWith(Class<?> clazz,
                                P param,
                                ClassVisitor<R,P> visitor)
        Crawls the hierarchy of the specified type using the specified visitor. The default settings will be used: pre-order traversal, stopping the crawl on the first non-null result, and including interfaces in the crawl.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type whose hierarchy will be crawled
        param - an optional parameter
        visitor - the visitor that is invoked for each type in the hierarchy
        Returns:
        the first non-null result from the specified visitor

      • visit

        public R visit(Class<?> clazz,
               P param)
        Crawls the hierarchy of the specified type. The parameter is passed to the underlying visitor for each type visited. The result will either be the first non-null result from the underlying visitor or the last result.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface ClassVisitor<R,P>
        Parameters:
        clazz - a type
        param - an optional parameter
        Returns:
        a result
        See Also:
        ClassHierarchyCrawler.Builder.crawlEverything(), ClassHierarchyCrawler.Builder.crawlUntilValueFound()
